# üéµ Free Music Sources for WordTraitor

## Curated List of Royalty-Free Music Websites

This document provides a comprehensive list of websites where you can find free, royalty-free music for your WordTraitor game.

---

## ‚≠ê Highly Recommended

### 1. **Incompetech (Kevin MacLeod)**
- **URL:** https://incompetech.com/music/
- **License:** Creative Commons BY 4.0
- **Cost:** Free with attribution
- **Why:** Huge library, perfect for games, easy downloads
- **Best For:** All three tracks (lobby, gameplay, results)

**Recommended Tracks:**
- Lobby: "Sneaky Snitch", "Wallpaper", "Carefree"
- Gameplay: "Investigations", "Scheming Weasel", "Cipher"
- Results: "Clash Defiant", "Dramatic Intro"

---

### 2. **Purple Planet Music**
- **URL:** https://www.purple-planet.com/
- **License:** Free for commercial use (attribution appreciated)
- **Cost:** Free
- **Why:** Game-focused music, mystery/suspense categories
- **Best For:** Gameplay music

**Browse Categories:**
- Mystery & Suspense
- Adventure & Fantasy
- Drama & Tension

---

### 3. **Bensound**
- **URL:** https://www.bensound.com/
- **License:** Free with attribution
- **Cost:** Free (or $5/month for no attribution)
- **Why:** High quality, polished tracks
- **Best For:** Lobby music

**Recommended:**
- "Dreams" (calm, ambient)
- "Acoustic Breeze" (light, casual)
- "November" (mysterious)

---

## üé∂ More Great Options

### 4. **FreePD (Public Domain)**
- **URL:** https://freepd.com/
- **License:** Public Domain (CC0)
- **Cost:** 100% free, no attribution required
- **Why:** Truly free, no strings attached

---

### 5. **YouTube Audio Library**
- **URL:** https://studio.youtube.com/channel/UC[YOUR_CHANNEL]/music
- **License:** Varies (most are free to use)
- **Cost:** Free
- **Why:** Huge selection, easy filtering
- **Note:** Requires Google account

**How to Use:**
1. Go to YouTube Studio
2. Click "Audio Library" in sidebar
3. Filter by mood: "Calm", "Suspenseful", "Dramatic"
4. Download and use

---

### 6. **Free Music Archive (FMA)**
- **URL:** https://freemusicarchive.org/
- **License:** Varies by track (check each)
- **Cost:** Free
- **Why:** Diverse, curated collections

---

### 7. **ccMixter**
- **URL:** https://ccmixter.org/
- **License:** Creative Commons (varies)
- **Cost:** Free
- **Why:** Remixes and original music, searchable

---

### 8. **Musopen**
- **URL:** https://musopen.org/
- **License:** Public Domain
- **Cost:** Free
- **Why:** Classical music recordings
- **Best For:** Elegant, classy background music

---

## üéÆ Game-Specific Music Sites

### 9. **OpenGameArt.org**
- **URL:** https://opengameart.org/art-search-advanced?keys=&field_art_type_tid%5B%5D=13
- **License:** Varies (mostly CC)
- **Cost:** Free
- **Why:** Made specifically for games

---

### 10. **Sonniss Game Audio**
- **URL:** https://sonniss.com/gameaudiogdc
- **License:** Free (check annual GDC bundle)
- **Cost:** Free
- **Why:** Professional game audio bundles

---

## üí∏ Premium (But Affordable)

### Epidemic Sound
- **URL:** https://www.epidemicsound.com/
- **Cost:** ~$15/month
- **Why:** Professional quality, huge library, easy licensing

### Artlist
- **URL:** https://artlist.io/
- **Cost:** ~$16/month
- **Why:** High-quality, unlimited downloads

---

## üîç Search Tips

### Keywords for Each Track:

**Lobby Music:**
- "ambient chill"
- "lofi background"
- "casual waiting"
- "menu music"
- "calm atmospheric"

**Gameplay Music:**
- "suspense mystery"
- "investigation thriller"
- "tension build"
- "puzzle game background"
- "detective noir"

**Results Music:**
- "dramatic reveal"
- "victory fanfare"
- "climax ending"
- "big reveal"
- "game over theme"

## ‚öñÔ∏è Licensing Quick Reference

| License Type | Can Use? | Attribution? | Commercial? |
|--------------|----------|--------------|-------------|
| **Public Domain (CC0)** | ‚úÖ Yes | ‚ùå No | ‚úÖ Yes |
| **CC BY** | ‚úÖ Yes | ‚úÖ Yes | ‚úÖ Yes |
| **CC BY-SA** | ‚úÖ Yes | ‚úÖ Yes | ‚úÖ Yes |
| **CC BY-NC** | ‚úÖ Yes | ‚úÖ Yes | ‚ùå No |
| **CC BY-ND** | ‚úÖ Yes | ‚úÖ Yes | ‚ö†Ô∏è No derivatives |

**For WordTraitor:** Use **CC0**, **CC BY**, or **CC BY-SA**

---

## üìù How to Attribute

If using CC BY music, add to your About page:

```markdown
### Music Credits

This game uses music from:

- "[Track Name]" by [Artist Name]
  From: [Website]
  License: [License Type]
  
- "[Track Name]" by [Artist Name]  
  From: [Website]
  License: [License Type]
```

---

## ‚ú® Pro Tips

1. **Download High Quality:** Choose 320kbps, then compress to 192kbps
2. **Test Before Committing:** Listen with game footage
3. **Match Game Mood:** Tense gameplay needs tense music
4. **Loop Points:** For looping tracks, pick ones with smooth loop points
5. **Volume Balance:** Gameplay music should be quieter than results music

---

## üö¶ Legal Stuff

- ‚úÖ **Always check the license** before using
- ‚úÖ **Keep attribution info** for CC music
- ‚úÖ **Read terms of use** on each site
- ‚ùå **Don't use copyrighted music** without permission
- ‚ùå **Don't claim music as your own**

---

## üéØ Quick Start Recommendations

**Easiest Route (All from one source):**

Go to **Incompetech.com** ‚Üí Download these 3 tracks:

1. **Lobby:** "Wallpaper" (calm, ambient)
2. **Gameplay:** "Investigations" (suspenseful)
3. **Results:** "Clash Defiant" (dramatic)

Rename them, add to `/public/music/`, done! üéâ
